content:
# Factorio Factory Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining Setup at position(x=16-22, y=71)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=16.0, y=71.0) with wooden chest (position x=16.5, y=72.5)
- Burner mining drill (position x=19.0, y=71.0) with wooden chest (position x=19.5, y=72.5)
- Burner mining drill (position x=22.0, y=71.0) with wooden chest (position x=22.5, y=72.5)

### Iron Plate Production Line at position(x=17-23, y=75)
Consists of following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x=17.0, y=75.0) with input burner inserter (position x=16.5, y=73.5), output burner inserter (position x=17.5, y=76.5) and output chest (position x=17.5, y=77.5)
- Stone furnace (position x=20.0, y=75.0) with input burner inserter (position x=19.5, y=73.5), output burner inserter (position x=20.5, y=76.5) and output chest (position x=20.5, y=77.5)
- Stone furnace (position x=23.0, y=75.0) with input burner inserter (position x=22.5, y=73.5), output burner inserter (position x=23.5, y=76.5) and output chest (position x=23.5, y=77.5)

### Transport Belt System at position(x=18.5-28.5, y=76.5-80.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Initial transport belt (position x=18.5, y=77.5)
- Vertical transport belts (positions x=18.5, y=76.5 to x=18.5, y=80.5)
- Horizontal transport belts (positions x=18.5, y=80.5 to x=28.5, y=80.5)
- Vertical transport belts (positions x=28.5, y=80.5 to x=28.5, y=78.5)
- Burner inserters connecting iron plate chests to belts:
  - Burner inserter (position x=17.5, y=78.5) connecting chest at x=17.5, y=77.5 to belt
  - Burner inserter (position x=20.5, y=78.5) connecting chest at x=20.5, y=77.5 to belt
  - Burner inserter (position x=23.5, y=78.5) connecting chest at x=23.5, y=77.5 to belt

### Power Generation System at position(x=-9.5 to -0.5, y=76.5 to 82.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=76.5)
- Boiler (position x=-5.5, y=79.0)
- Steam engine (position x=-0.5, y=82.5)
- Pipe network connecting these components
- Electric poles connecting the power to other structures

### Iron Gear Wheel Assembly at position(x=31.5, y=78.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine (position x=31.5, y=78.5) set to produce iron gear wheels
- Input inserter (position x=29.5, y=78.5)
- Output inserter (position x=33.5, y=78.5)
- Output chest (position x=34.5, y=78.5)
- Electric poles connecting power to the assembly machine

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities with transport belts
- When connecting distant entities with transport belts, ensure there is a valid path between them
- Example: Failed to connect transport belt at x=18.5 y=77.5 to inserter at x=29.5 y=78.5 due to path finding failure
- Build belts step by step in a continuous line rather than trying to connect
